meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Patti Demerirjian Bob Rome Doug Molitor Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #668.

div.div: Doug Molitor game 4. Single-player Final Jeopardy!

td.p: Patti Demerirjian, a housewife from Dayton, Ohio
Bob Rome, a music teacher from Los Angeles, California
Doug Molitor, a writer from Brentwood, California (whose 3-day cash winnings total $37,501)

tr.td: NAMESAKES
COLORS
TREES
BROADWAY LYRICS
WORLD LEADERS
STUPID ANSWERS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'He took not only inspiration but his stage name from French magician Jean Eugene Robert-Houdin')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: He took not only inspiration but his stage name from French magician Jean Eugene Robert-Houdin

toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', '(Doug: What is the mint Oreo?)

Doug
')

toggle('clue_J_2_5', 'clue_J_2_5_stuck', '[Fiddle music plays.]
(Alex: Patti, do you have a response?)
(Patti: No, I\'m sorry, I don\'t.)
(Alex: I had a feeling Bob might know it, being the music teacher. What is the [*]?)

"Orange Blossom Special"

Patti
')

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '"Cruciverbalist" is a 14-letter word for one who constructs these')

tr.td: WORD PLAY
"Cruciverbalist" is a 14-letter word for one who constructs these
Doug
Bob
Patti
4-day champion: $51,001
3rd place: an entertainment center
2nd place: a trip for 2 to Tampa, Florida
Doug
Bob
Patti

31 R
(including 1 DD),
5 W
(including 1 DD)

8 R,
6 W

9 R,
6 W
(including 1 DD)
